title: memes ai
description: 03.07.2024: Are we at a point where ai can make funny memes? I built an iOS app to find out.

title: happy - birthday reminder
description: I kept forgetting the birthdays of people I love, so I built an app to solve my problem and published it on the app store.

title: songgpt
description: I wondered if a text-based LLM like ChatGPT can create original music compositions so I built a web-app to explore this idea. I am not sure anything useful came out of this other than learning a couple of nice tricks for prompt engineering.

title: piasso - ai assistant
description: I built Piasso for three reasons. (1) I wanted to allow people to generate ai images in any language, (2) I wanted to replicate ChatGPT's functionality using DaVinci and (3) I wanted to allow people in Egypt to try ChatGPT while it was banned there. At the peak Piasso had around ~1k weekly active users but I couldn't sustain the cost of running it so I paused registrations and halted growth.
